issue.message: Replace the <fragment> tag with FragmentContainerView.

It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
Very long vector path (904 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/clear_sky` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.MyWeatherApplication`)
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/pure_sunny` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/Theme.MyWeatherApplication`)
